Uses of Class
org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.QueryTranslator

Packages that use QueryTranslator
org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.trans Provides translators for Cayenne queries. 
org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba Provides default implementation of DbAdapter architecture. 
org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba.oracle DbAdapter implementation for Oracle RDBMS. 
 

Uses of QueryTranslator in org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.trans
 

Subclasses of QueryTranslator in org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.trans
 class DeleteTranslator
          Class implements default translation mechanism of org.objectstyle.cayenne.query.DeleteQuery objects to SQL DELETE statements.
 class InsertTranslator
          Class implements default translation mechanism of org.objectstyle.cayenne.query.InsertQuery objects to SQL INSERT statements.
 class ProcedureTranslator
          Stored procedure query translator.
 class QueryAssembler
          Abstract superclass of Query translators.
 class SelectTranslator
          Class that serves as a translator of SELECT queries to JDBC statements.
 class SqlModifyTranslator
          Deprecated. Since 1.1. This translator was intended for SqlModifyQuery that is deprecated in favor of SQLTemplate.
 class SqlSelectTranslator
          Deprecated. Since 1.1. This translator was intended for SqlSelectQuery that is deprecated in favor of SQLTemplate.
 class UpdateTranslator
          Class implements default translation mechanism of org.objectstyle.cayenne.query.UpdateQuery objects to SQL UPDATE statements.
 

Uses of QueryTranslator in org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba
 

Methods in org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba that return QueryTranslator
 QueryTranslator JdbcAdapter.getQueryTranslator(Query query)
           
 QueryTranslator DbAdapter.getQueryTranslator(Query query)
          Creates and returns a QueryTranslator appropriate for the specified query parameter.
 

Uses of QueryTranslator in org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba.oracle
 

Subclasses of QueryTranslator in org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba.oracle
 class OracleSelectTranslator
          Select translator that implements Oracle-specific optimizations.
